output_list.reason: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
Integer overflow in the sell function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount * sellPrice'.
Integer overflow in the buy function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'amount * buyPrice'.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'balanceOf[_from] -= _value'.
Integer overflow in burnFrom function allows a potential trap due to overflow of 'balanceOf[_from] -= _value'.
